item.title: Network Protocals
item.description: In Progress.. TCP(Transmission Control Protocal) Description : TCP provides reliable, ordered, and error-checked delivery of a stream of octets (bytes) between applications running on hosts communicating via an IP network Three way handshare(at the begining) step1 : Client sends -> I want to talk -> Server step2 : Client recieves <- "Sure. Are you Ready? <- Server step3 : Client sends -> "Yes I am Ready" -> Server <- TCP Connection established -> Its Dominant protocal & Used for
